title: Liverpool's Frustrating Opener
description:
The FC crew react to Liverpool's 2-2 draw against Fulham, which Jurgen Klopp called "12 out of 10 frustrating" after the match. Meanwhile, Chelsea and Tottenham get off to winning starts despite one performing more lively than the other, and Lionel Messi and Neymar look back to their best for PSG in Ligue 1 opener.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Liverpool held to frustrating draw against Fulham; Chelsea and Spurs start with wins; Messi and Neymar back to their best?
